panels.description: Number of nodes that reported their status as Starting or Joining
panels.title: Joining

panels.description: Number of nodes that reported their status as  Leaving, Decommissioned, Draining or Drained
panels.title: Leaving

panels.description: The percentage of the time during which Scylla utilized the CPU. Note that because Scylla does busy polling for some time before going idle, CPU utilization as seen by the operating system may be much higher. Your system is not yet CPU-bottlenecked until this metric is high.
panels.title: Load

targets.expr: $func(rate(scylla_alternator_op_latency_sum{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="PutItem"}[60s])) by ([[by]])/($func(rate(scylla_alternator_op_latency_count{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="PutItem"}[60s])) by ([[by]]) + 1)
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(scylla_alternator_op_latency_bucket{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="PutItem"}[60s])) by ([[by]], le))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(scylla_alternator_op_latency_bucket{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="PutItem"}[60s])) by ([[by]], le))

$func(rate(scylla_alternator_op_latency_sum{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="GetItem"}[60s])) by ([[by]])/($func(rate(scylla_alternator_op_latency_count{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="GetItem"}[60s])) by ([[by]]) + 1)

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(scylla_alternator_op_latency_bucket{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="GetItem"}[60s])) by ([[by]], le))

$func(rate(scylla_alternator_op_latency_sum{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="UpdateItem"}[60s])) by ([[by]])/($func(rate(scylla_alternator_op_latency_count{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="UpdateItem"}[60s])) by ([[by]]) + 1)

$func(rate(scylla_alternator_op_latency_sum{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="DeleteItem"}[60s])) by ([[by]])/($func(rate(scylla_alternator_op_latency_count{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="DeleteItem"}[60s])) by ([[by]]) + 1)

panels.description: Number of rows that were read from the cache, without needing to be fetched from storage.
panels.title: Cache Hits

panels.description: Number of rows that were not present in the cache, and had to be fetched from storage.
panels.title: Cache Misses

panels.description: Requests that Scylla tried to write but timed out. Timeouts are counted in the node that received the request (the coordinator), not at the replicas.
panels.title: Write Timeouts/Minutes by [[by]]

panels.description: Requests that Scylla tried to read but timed out. Timeouts are counted in the node that received the request (the coordinator), not at the replicas.
panels.title: Read Timeouts/Minutes by [[by]]
